archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.4.3: Vulnerability assessments should take into account the different formats of information (e.g. digital, physical or cognitive) handled in the target environment at each stage of the information lifecycle, including:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
